dmca.title: Copyright infringment
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Web Markets [mailto:kevin@wmarkets.co.uk] 
Sent: Sunday, April 10, 2005 8:20 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright infringment


Dear Sirs
 
The site below, hosted by you, is infringing our copyright. 
 
I hereby confirm that I am authorised to act on behalf of the owner of the
copyright for http://www.dab-solutions.co.uk The owner of this copyright is
Dab Solutions Limited. We have allready rang the companies contact phone
number 01282 854880 and asked for this site to be taken down and we have
emailed them before concerning this. But many tens of infringing pages are
still present. They have failed to remove them or take the site down.

The sitename that is infringing is http://uklaptop-repair.com/index.html. It
is another Laptop repair company many of the graphics and texts have also
been used on their main site http://uklaptop-repair.com
<http://uklaptop-repair.com/uklaptop-repair.com/website/flatsite/renderhtml_
_site_1_ref_18_pageid_1_flatsite_yes_sidstep_1.html> . 
 
Here is the home page that has been copied. All the links from this page
take you to other infringing pages.
http://uklaptop-repair.com/uklaptop-repair.com/website/flatsite/renderhtml__
site_1_ref_18_pageid_1_flatsite_yes_sidstep_1.html
 
Our copyright ownership is clearly stated on the site thus:
  'Copyright C Dab Solutions UK Co. 2002-2003. All rights reserved.'
 
I have a good faith belief that the use of our material on this
website is not authorised by your company name, the copyright owner, or the
law.
 
I hereby confirm that all of the above information is accurate and that I am
authorised to act on behalf of the copyright owner. I state this under
penalty of perjury.
 
I am thus writing to you to request that this site is removed from
your servers.
 
Yours sincerely,
 
Kevin O'Brien
